text: Fuze Beverage is a manufacturer of teas and non-carbonated fruit drinks enriched with vitamins. It consists of five vitamin-infused lines: Slenderize, Refresh, Tea, Defensify, and Vitalize. It was founded by Lance Collins and creative director Paula Grant in the basement of Collins' Englewood Cliffs, New Jersey home in 2000. Category:American food companies Category:Soft drinks Category:2000 establishments in the United States
title: Fuze Beverage
